introduction.sub-title: What I can help you with
introduction.title: My Services
introduction.text: These are the services that I am confident I can execute best when hired by your company. However, if there are different requirements for recruitment, don't worry, I will also strive to ensure the best completion of the tasks.

services.title: Web Development
services.text: Crafting fast, responsive, and maintainable websites — from clean **front-end interfaces** to solid **back-end architectures**.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.text: Building **cross-platform mobile apps** using **Flutter** and **React Native**, ensuring smooth UX across Android and iOS.

services.title: Data Analysis & Machine Learning
services.text: Turning data into insights through **analysis**, **visualization**, and **machine learning** — from preprocessing to prediction.

services.title: Other services
services.text: I am **adaptable** and **capable** of learning new technologies and frameworks to meet the unique needs of your project.
